title: RT News - October 15, 2019 (17:00 MSK)
text: An “anti-Trump crusade” and "bias” at the highest levels, a CNN whistle-blower claims 'bombshell revelations' about the American news channel known for its not very warm relations with the US president. Violence in the restive Spanish region of Catalonia as a Madrid court hands down lengthy sentences on separatist leaders. Democratic presidential hopefuls in the US call for changes to an HIV disclosure law, that lands people in jail when they fail to reveal their health status. There's been some strong reaction to that. Extinction Rebellion protesters defy a London-wide protest ban following a so-called police crackdown on the climate change demonstrations. Arrests are again made this time outside the capital's iconic MI5 building.
